## Simulation
```{r acp}
    df_num.pr = prcomp(df_num, center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)
    summary(df_num.pr)

    values = summary(df_num.pr)$importance[2,][1:6]
    barplot = barplot(values, ylim = c(0, 0.5))
    text(barplot, values + 0.02, label_percent()(values), cex = 1)
```
